data.name: ATTACK_DONT_OWN_COUNTRY
data.value: Can't attack. You don't own the country from which you want to attack.

data.name: ATTACK_ONLY_NEIGHBOUR
data.value: Can't attack. You can only attack a country from a neighbouring Country.

data.name: ATTACK_OWN_COUNTRY
data.value: Can't attack. You can't attack a country you allready own.

data.name: ATTACK_WITH_TO_MANY_ARMIES
data.value: Can't attack. When you attack with more then three countries you must leave three armies on your country or else atleast one or two depending on how much used in the attack.

data.name: CANT_ADDPLAYER_IF_GAME_STARTED
data.value: Can't add a player after the game is started.

data.name: CANT_ADD_MORE_PLAYERS_AS_COLORS
data.value: Can't add a player because there are no more colors left in playerColorrs

data.name: CANT_ATTACK_GAME_NOT_STARTED
data.value: Can't call Attack. The game is not started.

data.name: CANT_ATTACK_NOT_IN_FASE
data.value: Can't call Attack. The game is not in the Attack fase.

data.name: CANT_CHOOSETURNTYPE_GAME_NOT_STARTED
data.value: Can't call ChooseTurnType . The game is not started.

data.name: CANT_CHOOSETURNTYPE_NOT_IN_FASE
data.value: Can't call ChooseTurnType . The game is not in the ChooseTurnType fase.

data.name: CANT_EXCHANGECARDS_GAME_NOT_STARTED
data.value: Can't call ExchangeCards. The game is not started.

data.name: CANT_EXCHANGECARDS_NOT_IN_FASE
data.value: Can't call ExchangeCards. The game is not in the ExchangeCards fase.

data.name: CANT_GOTONEXTFASE_GAME_IS_ENDED
data.value: Can't call GoToNextFase. The game is ended.

data.name: CANT_GOTONEXTFASE_GAME_NOT_STARTED
data.value: Can't call GoToNextFase. The game is not started.

data.name: CANT_MOVEARMIES_GAME_NOT_STARTED
data.value: Can't call MoveArmies. The game is not started.

data.name: CANT_MOVEARMIES_NOT_IN_FASE
data.value: Can't call MoveArmies. The game is not in the MoveArmiesAfterAttack or MoveArmiesEndOfTurn fase.

data.name: CANT_MOVE_ALL_OR_MORE_ARMIES
data.value: Can't MoveArmies. You can't move more or all armies on the a Country to the other Country. You must leace at least one armie on the the Country.

data.name: CANT_MOVE_FROM_OTHER_COUNTRIES
data.value: Can't MoveArmies. You can only move armies from or to a Country you just attacked.

data.name: CANT_PLACENEWARMIES_GAME_NOT_STARTED
data.value: Can't call PlaceNewArmies. The game is not started.

data.name: CANT_PLACENEWARMIES_NOT_IN_FASE
data.value: Can't call PlaceNewArmies. The game is not in the PlaceNewArmies or PlaceInitialArmies fase.

data.name: CANT_PLACE_MORE_AS_OWNED
data.value: Can't PlaceNewArmies. You can't place more armies as you own.

data.name: CANT_START_WITH_LESS_MIN_PLAYERS
data.value: Can't start the game. There are less players added as defined in MinimumNumberPlayers in the config.

data.name: FROM_AND_TO_CANT_BE_THE_SAME
data.value: Can't MoveArmies. The to and from country can't be the same.

data.name: GAME_ALREADY_STARTED
data.value: Can't start the game.The game is already started.

data.name: HOLD_TO_MANY_CARDS
data.value: Can't GoToNextFase. You hold to many cards. Exchanges cards before calling GoToNextFase.

data.name: MOVEARMIES_DONT_OWN_COUNTRY
data.value: Can't MoveArmies. You must own the to and from country.

data.name: MOVE_ONLY_NEIGHBOUR
data.value: Can't MoveArmies. You can only move to a country from a neighbouring country.

data.name: MOVE_ONLY_ONCE_IN_A_TURN
data.value: Can't call MoveArmies. You can only move armies once in a fase. Call GoToNextFase.

data.name: MUST_ATTACK_AT_LEAST_ONE_ARMIE
data.value: Can't attack. You must at least attack with one armie.

data.name: MUST_CHOOSETURNTYPE
data.value: Can't GoToNextFase. You must choose a TurnType before calling GoToNextFase.

data.name: MUST_LEAVE_ATTACKING_COUNTRIES
data.value: Can't MoveArmies. You must at least leave the amount of armies used in the last attack on the country you just won.

data.name: MUST_MOVE_AT_LEAST_ONE_ARMIE
data.value: Can't MoveArmies. You must at least move one country.

data.name: MUST_PLACE_AT_LEAST_ONE_ARMIE
data.value: Can't PlaceNewArmies. You must at least place one country.

data.name: NOT_A_VALID_COUNTRY_NAME
data.value: Can't PlaceNewArmies. You did not provide a valid country Name.

data.name: NOT_LOADED_WORLD_CORRECT
data.value: When calling LoadContinentsAndCountries there where no or not enough countries and/ord continents loaded.

data.name: PLACENEWARMIES_DONT_OWN_COUNTRY
data.value: Can't PlaceNewArmies. You don't own this country.

data.name: PLACE_ALL_NEW_ARMIES
data.value: Can't GoToNextFase. You must place all new armies before calling GoToNextFase.

data.name: PLAYER_COLORS_COUNT_SMALLER_MIN_PLAYERS
data.value: The amount of playerColors can't be smaller as the MinimumNumberPlayers defined in the config.

data.name: WRONG_TURNTYPE
data.value: Can't GoToNextFase. Something is wrong TurnType should be a valid values but is not.
